title: Finding Nemo
creator_credit: Pixar Animation Studios, Walt Disney Pictures, Graham Walters and Andrew Stanton
brief_description: When Nemo, a young clownfish, is unexpectedly carried far from home, his father Marlin, and Dory, a friendly but forgetful regal blue tang fish embark on an epic journey. Features the voices of Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem DaFoe, Brad Garrett.
creator_credit_for_label: Pixar Animation Studios, Walt Disney Pictures, Graham Walters and Andrew Stanton
